About Design Dot

Passionate about coffee, committed to quality, dedicated to sustainability

Our Story

Design Dot was born from a simple belief: everyone deserves access to exceptional coffee. Founded in 2020 by a group of coffee enthusiasts, we set out to bridge the gap between coffee producers and coffee lovers around the world.

What started as a small operation sourcing beans from a single farm in Ethiopia has grown into a global network of partnerships with coffee farmers across Africa, Central America, and South America. But our mission remains the same ‚Äì to deliver the finest coffee while ensuring fair compensation for the hardworking farmers who make it all possible.

‚òï

Our Values

üå±

Sustainability

We're committed to environmental sustainability and supporting farming practices that protect our planet for future generations.

ü§ù

Fair Trade

We work directly with farmers to ensure they receive fair compensation and have the resources to improve their communities.

‚≠ê

Quality

We never compromise on quality. Every bean is carefully selected, roasted to perfection, and delivered fresh to your door.

üìö

Education

We believe in sharing knowledge about coffee culture, brewing techniques, and the stories behind each cup.
